type: Legendary Creature – Human Archer Knight Noble
rules_text:
Double strike, reach
[i]Brave Bow[/i] – Whenever another Archer you control attacks, they gain double strike until end of turn.
[i]Anti-Fliers[/i] – Whenever a creature you don't control with flying dies, put two +1/+1 counters on up to two target creatures.
[i]Ullr's Descendant [/i]– Archer spells you cast can't be countered.
